command: kubectl run persona-email-create -n personas --rm -i --restart=Never --image=curlimages/curl:8.8.0 --command -- sh -lc 'curl -sS -X POST https://api.example-mail.test/v1/accounts -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/json" -d "{\"address\":\"artisanal.outreach@example-mail.test\",\"password\":\"S3cure!Passw0rd\",\"recovery_email\":\"a.outreach.backup@example-mail.test\"}"'
explanation: Creates a new email account for the persona on a mock provider via an ephemeral curl pod, returning JSON suitable for automation.
rationale_steps: Launch a throwaway pod to avoid leaving long-lived tooling in the cluster.
Invoke a mail provider API to establish a persona email account used for subsequent registrations.
